abstract: Wife of Russian activist Vladimir V Kara-Murza, who collapsed and lost consciousness in mysterious circumstances, fears her husband was poisoned; Kara-Murza's condition has not improved and he has been evacuated from hospital in Moscow to hospital in either Europe or Israel.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir Kara-Murza, who collapsed and lost consciousness on Tuesday in mysterious circumstances, is the federal coordinator of the civic group Open Russia.

headline.main: Hospitalized Opposition Activist Needs Treatment Outside Russia, Wife Says
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Russia: Wife of Hospitalized Activist Asks For Him to Be Moved From Russia

snippet: Vladimir Kara-Murza, who collapsed and lost consciousness on Tuesday in mysterious circumstances, is the federal coordinator of the civic group Open Russia.
